```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
devtools::install_github("benmarwick/wordcountaddin")

``
> Word count: `r wordcountaddin::word_count()'

```


```{r}
candcont <- candidates%>% 
  left_join(contributions, "cand_id")
```

```{r}
candcont%>%
  filter(cand_election_yr == 2012)%>% 
  filter(cand_ici== "I")%>%
  group_by()
  mutate(transaction_type, forcand = "24K"| "24E")
  group_by(cand_id, cand_name)%>%
  summarize(total_cont = sum(transaction_amt))%>% 
  boxplot <- ggplot(candcont, aes(x = cand_ici, y = )
  

```

```{r}
ron_kind <- candidates %>%
  filter(cand_name == "KIND, RON")
```

```{r}
library(Stat2Data)
```
